TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Switch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个用于创建新的调试和跟踪开关的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class to create new debugging and tracing switches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开关提供一种有效的机制, 用于在运行时使用外部设置控制跟踪和调试输出。A switch provides an efficient mechanism for controlling tracing and debugging output at run time using external settings. 类实现开关的默认行为, 使您可以在运行时更改交换机级别。The class implements default behavior for switches, allowing you to change the switch level at run time. 此类是 和类的基类。This class is the base class for the , and the classes. 这些开关满足大多数调试和跟踪需求。These switches meet most debugging and tracing needs. 有关跟踪开关的详细信息, 请参阅[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). 您必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 以下语法是编译器特定的。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用C#或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器, 请参阅编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在中C#启用调试, `/d:DEBUG`请在编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行, 或者将添加`#define DEBUG`到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中, 将`/d:DEBUG=True`标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要在中C#使用启用跟踪, `/d:TRACE`请在编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行, 或`#define TRACE`将添加到文件的顶部。To enable tracing using in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中, 将`/d:TRACE=True`标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要设置交换机的级别, 请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your switch, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中, 你可以添加开关并设置其值、删除开关或清除之前由应用程序设置的所有开关。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例:The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 此示例配置节定义 `mySwitch` 属性设置`true`为的, 并将值设置为。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在应用程序中, 可以通过创建一个具有相同名称的来使用已配置的开关值, 如下面的代码示例中所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/remarks.cs#4)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个具有四个跟踪级别的新类, 这些跟踪可用于跟踪调用堆栈。The following example shows how to define a new class with four levels of tracing that can be used to trace a call stack. 您可以使用开关来检测您的应用程序, 以便在每次输入或退出该方法时进行记录。You can use the switch to instrument your application to log each time the method is entered or exited. 第一个示例创建用于设置交换机级别的枚举。The first example creates the enumeration used to set the level of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建新的开关。The following example creates the new switch. 此代码实现了`Level`一个属性以设置新开关的值。The code implements a `Level` property to set the value of the new switch. `Level`调用受保护的属性, 该属性将值分配给新的开关。`Level` calls the protected property that assigns the value to the new switch. 此示例还实现了两个取值函数属性以获取开关的分配值。This example also implements two assessor properties to get the assigned value of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的示例在中`Main`创建一个新开关。The following example creates a new switch in `Main`. 它将创建一个新的开关, 并为其分配一个值。It creates a new switch and assigns it a value. 然后, 它会输出用于输入和离开方法的调试消息, 具体取决于开关设置。Then, depending on the switch settings, it outputs debugging messages for entering and leaving the method. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

para.span: 如果需要跟踪级别, 或设置与所提供 的开关级别不同的机制, 可以从继承。

span.span: If you need trace levels, or mechanisms for setting switch levels different from those provided by , and , you can inherit from .

para.span: 从此类继承时, 必须实现方法。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的对象时, 将使用`displayName`参数的值来查找初始开关设置。When you create a new object, the value of the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 默认值为空字符串 ("")。The default value is an empty string (""). 在 XML 配置文件中, 可以添加开关并设置其值、删除开关或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有开关。Within the XML configuration file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 在应用程序执行过程中, 不会检测到配置文件的动态更改。Dynamic changes to the configuration file are not detected while the application is executing. 必须停止并重新启动应用程序, 然后对配置文件所做的更改才会生效。You must stop and restart an application before changes to the configuration file take effect. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例:The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

para.span: 若要设置开关的值, 请在构造函数中设置属性。

span.span: To set the value of the switch, set the property in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: protected Switch (string displayName, string description, string defaultSwitchValue);

The description of the switch.

summary.span: 通过指定开关的显示名称、说明和默认值来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the display name, description, and default value for the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数用于设置属性的值, 而`description`参数用于设置属性的属性值。 `displayName`The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. 如果属性未通过代码或配置文件属性设置, 则`defaultSwitchValue`参数为开关的值。 The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is the value for the switch if the property is not set by code or by the configuration file attribute. 有关其他信息, 请参阅重载。See the overload for additional information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取在应用程序配置文件中定义的自定义开关特性。

span.span: Gets the custom switch attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: 一个 ，包含跟踪开关的自定义特性（不区分大小写）。

span.span: A containing the case-insensitive custom attributes for the trace switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义属性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 未引用的自定义特性不会被枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 从类继承的类可以通过重写方法并返回自定义属性名称的字符串数组, 来添加自定义特性。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为自定义开关显示无法识别的特性。The following code sample shows how to display the unrecognized attributes for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a description of the switch.
The description of the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应指示开关的功能；例如，“为目录观察程序组件启用跟踪”。This property should indicate the function of the switch; for example, "Enables tracing for a directory watcher component." 此值由 `descriptor` 构造函数中的 参数设置。The value is set by the `descriptor` parameter in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取用于标识该开关的名称。

span.span: Gets a name used to identify the switch.

value.span: 用于标识该开关的名称。

span.span: The name used to identify the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的对象时, 将查找初始开关设置。When you create a new object, the finds initial switch settings. 有关详细信息, 请参阅构造函数[和如何:在 Visual Studio 文档中创建、](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)初始化和配置跟踪开关。For more information, see the constructor and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了跟踪源正在使用的开关的显示名称。The following code example displays the display name for the switch in use by a trace source. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例, 可在类摘要中找到。This code example is part of a larger example that can be found in the class summary. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetSupportedAttributes() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function GetSupportedAttributes () As String()
abstract member GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[] override this.GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[]

summary.span: 获取开关支持的自定义特性。

span.span: Gets the custom attributes supported by the switch.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，包含开关所支持的自定义特性的名称；如果该开关不支持任何自定义特性，则为 。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the custom attributes supported by the switch, or if there no custom attributes are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的默认实现返回`null`。The default implementation for the method returns `null`. 如果在配置文件中添加了一个开关并且指定了未包含在返回的字符串数组中的自定义特性 , 则在加载该开关时, 将引发。If a switch is added in a configuration file and custom attributes are specified that are not included in the string array returned by , a is thrown when the switch is loaded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何为自定义开关重写方法。The following code sample shows an override of the method for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#34)]

para.span: 从类或派生类继承时, 可以重写方法以为类提供自定义特性。

span.span: When inheriting from the class or a derived class, you can override the method to provide custom attributes for your class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当 属性更改时调用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次从配置文件中读取值时调用, 并在每次更改开关的值时再次调用。 is invoked the first time a switch reads the value from the configuration file and is invoked again each time the switch's value is changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnValueChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnValueChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当 属性更改时调用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将属性的新值分析为一个整数值, 该值将用于设置属性。The default implementation parses the new value of the property to an integer value which it uses to set the property.

para.span: 你应重写此方法, 并使用为你的开关设置适当值的转换。

span.span: You should override this method and use a conversion that sets the appropriate value for your switch.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int SwitchSetting { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SwitchSetting : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此开关的当前设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current setting for this switch.
The current setting for this switch.
The default is zero.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Value : string with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the switch.

value.span: 一个表示开关的值的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the value of the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性的值更改时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the value of the property is changed. 方法分析此属性的值, 并将其转换为整数值, 然后使用该值来设置属性。 The method parses the value of this property and converts it to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.

span.span: The value is .
-or-

exception.span: 该值不是仅由一个可选负号后跟一系列从 0 到 9 的数字组成的。

span.span: The value does not consist solely of an optional negative sign followed by a sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
-or-

exception.span: 该值表示小于 或大于 的数字。

span.span: The value represents a number less than or greater than .

para.span: 应该重写方法, 并提供一个转换操作来设置开关的适当值。

span.span: You should override the method and provide a conversion operation that sets the appropriate value for your switch.
